page.title: 03B.U.P.A.Hospital
page.content: The B.U.P.A.hospital is in North Pentwyn."B.U.P.A."stands forBritish United Provident Association.123 people work there.Of these 59 are nurses,14 are cleaners,4 cooks and 3 secretaries.There are 14 nurses on nght duty and 45 on day duty.About 130 surgeons perform operations there and they also work in other places.The nearest B.U.P.A.hospital to the one in North Pentwyn is on the outskirts of London,in Harpenden.Some patients come from different parts of the world.They choose their own food from a menu.The food comes from local suppliers and is delivered.B.U.P.A.can call on a private ambulance and does accept emergency calls,but not accident emergencies.They do not have medical wards as well as surgical wards.They have 48 beds,2 wards,19 single rooms,
